Holiday notice: EUR SEPA payments paused during Easter holidays
Bitstamp's EUR SEPA payments will be paused on March 29 and April 1, 2024, due to Good Friday and Easter Monday.

Due to the upcoming EU public holidays, Bitstamp's EUR SEPA payment clearing system will be unavailable on Good Friday, March 29, 2024, and Easter Monday, April 1, 2024.

USD and GBP (FPS) deposits and withdrawals, credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers will remain unaffected.

All EUR SEPA deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day—on April 2, 2024.

If you need any help or additional information, please contact us at  support@bitstamp.net.

We wish all our customers very happy Easter holidays!
